title: CRT Fears = Jan 6 Fears 9.17.21
itunes:title: CRT Fears = Jan 6 Fears 9.17.21
description:
In episode 990, Jack and Miles are joined by the host of the Sparkleside Chats with Magical Girl Ayu podcast Ayumi Shinozaki to discuss how critical race theory fears are the same as Jan 6 fears, ​​the Murdough family murder mystery, TUCKER CARLSON IS A JOURNALIST! BALLGATE Continues, Divorce the new Fall Trend? and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. CRT Fears the same as Jan 6 fears it turns out…
  2. The Murdaugh Family Saga Is Wild
  3. TUCKER CARLSON IS A JOURNALIST! BALLGATE Continues…
  4. Divorce the new Fall Trend?
  5. Ayumi’s Print Shop
  6. LISTEN: Deb Never “Funky”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
